name: grocery-app
description: A simple **Grocery Management Application** with a **Node.js backend** and **MySQL database**. The app allows users to login, view grocery items, add them to their cart, and track orders. ``` ## ðŸ“‚ Project Structure E-MART/ â”œâ”€â”€ config/ â”‚   â””â”€â”€ db.js                  # Database configuration (MongoDB/MySQL) â”œâ”€â”€ node_modules/              # Installed dependencies (auto-generated) â”œâ”€â”€ public/                    # Static files (frontend) â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ cart.html              # Shopping cart page â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ grocery.html           # Grocery items page â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ index.html             # Homepage â”‚   â””â”€â”€ signup.html            # User registration page â”œâ”€â”€ routes/ â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ api.js                # Grocery item API routes â”œâ”€â”€ views/                     # HTML templates (if using server-side rendering) â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ cart.html           # Duplicate?
